accussed_details.name: Muhammad Jameel
allegation: Filed suit for restitution of conjugal rights

complaint_summary: Zubaida Bibi filed a suit for dissolution of marriage against Muhammad Jameel, citing apprehension of danger to her life and modesty if pursuing the case in Lahore.
investigation_summary: The petitioner filed for dissolution of marriage in Vehari, while the respondent counter-filed for restitution of conjugal rights in Lahore. The petitioner sought transfer of the latter suit to Vehari citing safety concerns and potential conflicting judgments.
judgment_summary: The court accepted the transfer application, withdrawing the suit for restitution of conjugal rights from Lahore and transferring it to Vehari to be heard alongside the dissolution of marriage case.
Decision_or_verdict: Application accepted; both suits to be heard together in Vehari.
legal_arguments: Section 25-A of the West Pakistan Family Courts Act, 1964
Section 3(b)(iv) of The Soldiers (Litigation) Act No. IV of 1925
Section 5 and Section 6 of The Soldiers (Litigation) Act No. IV of 1925
statutes: The Soldiers (Litigation) Act No. IV of 1925
sections: Section 3(b)(iv) (The Soldiers (Litigation) Act No. IV of 1925)
Section 5 (The Soldiers (Litigation) Act No. IV of 1925)
Section 6 (The Soldiers (Litigation) Act No. IV of 1925)
key_issues: Transfer of suit for restitution of conjugal rights

key_points.petitioner_suit: Dissolution of marriage filed on 1995-01-12 in Vehari
key_points.respondent_suit: Restitution of conjugal rights filed on 1995-01-22 in Lahore
key_points.transfer_reason: Petitioner apprehends danger to life and modesty and seeks to avoid conflicting judgments
key_points.respondent_objection: Difficulty in attending Vehari court due to soldier duties in Lahore
key_points.court_decision: Both suits interlinked; transferred to Vehari for joint hearing
key_points.legal_preference: Law favors females in matrimonial cases; earlier suit prioritized

final_order.transferred_suit: Restitution of conjugal rights titled 'Muhammad Jameel v. Mst. Zubaida Bibi'
final_order.transferred_to: Senior Civil Judge/Judge, Family Court, Vehari

legal_terms.Restitution of conjugal rights: Legal action to restore marital relations
legal_terms.Dissolution of marriage: Legal termination of a marital relationship

words_and_phrases.Special conditions: Circumstances affecting soldiers' ability to attend court

summary_vector_notes: The case involves matrimonial disputes between Zubaida Bibi and Muhammad Jameel, with suits for dissolution of marriage and restitution of conjugal rights filed in Vehari and Lahore respectively. The court transferred the latter suit to Vehari to ensure both cases are heard together, citing safety concerns for the petitioner and avoidance of conflicting judgments.
